titleStmt.title: A declaration of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament, for the speedy setting forth of a fleet of ships to sea, for the defence of the kingdome Die Lunæ, 13. Martii, 1642.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: March 14. Printed at London for John Wright in the Old-bailey,
